2004.title: Introducing the all-new event timeline
2004.body:
This is a demo for a Tutorialzine tutorial. You can slide through all of the events on the timeline and click the ones you are interested in.

The timeline is dynamically build according to records in the MySQL database, so inserting new events is as easy as inserting a new row to the table.

Feel free to leave your comments on the tutorial homepage (links are provided at the top and bottom of this demo).

Have a great stay!
2004.3:
This is a demo for a Tutorialzine tutorial. You can slide through all of the events on the timeline and click the ones you are interested in.

2004.title: First meeting with venture capitalists
2004.body:
Soon after, our Company Co was founded!

Be sure to check the rest of our company history in the time line :)
2004.3:
Soon after, our Company Co was founded!

Be sure to check the rest of our company history in the time line :)

2004.title: Moving in
2004.body:
The company rented a garage right next to the one that Google started from.

The CEO is certain that this means guaranteed success.

Only if we could drive out the old Dodge that occupies the space inside. It smells funny.
2004.3:

The CEO is certain that this means guaranteed success.

Only if we could drive out the old Dodge that occupies the space inside. It smells funny.

2005.title: Started our famous Free Vacation With Every Purchase Campaign
2005.2: Started our famous Free Vacation With Every Purchase Campaign

2005.title: Voted the startup with best support
2005.2: Voted the startup with best support
2005.body:
A fantastic achievement given that our only tech support guy doesn't speak English.

Guess the other companies' support is really bad.
2005.3:
A fantastic achievement given that our only tech support guy doesn't speak English.

Guess the other companies' support is really bad.

2008.title: 2000 million in profits for the second quarter
2008.2: 2000 million in profits for the second quarter
2008.body:
For our main competitors.

It is not that bad for Company Co though, at least we moved to a bigger garage.
2008.3:
For our main competitors.

It is not that bad for Company Co though, at least we moved to a bigger garage.

2008.title: A huge upgrade to the servers
2008.2: A huge upgrade to the servers
2008.body:
During a scheduled maintenance to the hardware, the engineering team discovered that the server farm has been powered by hamster wheels all along.

Thanks to their fast reactions and professionalism, additional hamster wheels where installed in order to accommodate the next generation of servers.
2008.3:
During a scheduled maintenance to the hardware, the engineering team discovered that the server farm has been powered by hamster wheels all along.

Thanks to their fast reactions and professionalism, additional hamster wheels where installed in order to accommodate the next generation of servers.

2009.title: A Corporate organ donor campaign
2009.body:
The management team decided to start company-wide organ donation campaign.

All the employees are obliged to participate.

In typical managerial style, we have a deadline till the end of the month to deliver a liver, two hearts and four kidneys.
2009.3:

All the employees are obliged to participate.

In typical managerial style, we have a deadline till the end of the month to deliver a liver, two hearts and four kidneys.

2010.title: Petting zoo grand opening
2010.body:
Here at Company Co we love children. This is why we organized a free Petting zoo weekend at the park.

However the company was having some financial difficulties, so we had to apply some restrictions.

The llamas were plush and our interface designer, John, was dressed as a panda.
